message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find the product at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
